title.narrative: Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation (CAREC) Transport Corridor 1 (Zhambyl Oblast Section) Investment Program - Tranche 1

description.narrative: The Project will reconstruct 125 km of highway sections between Taraz and Korday in Zhambyl Oblast; and improve road operation and maintenance system. This will contribute in sustaining economic development and increasing domestic and international trade growth within Kazakhstan and between Kazakhstan and its trading partners.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Efficient transport network in Taraz-Kulan and Blagoveschenka-Korday road sections

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Increased average traffic volume to 2,000 vpd in 2014 from 1,000 vpd in 2007

description.narrative: Efficient transport network in Taraz-Kulan and Blagoveschenka-Korday road sections

title.narrative: Reduced average travel time to 1 hour in 2014 from 2 hours in 2007
